actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to eliminate the price support and production adjustment programs for milk, cotton, rice, honey, and tobacco, and for other purposes.
short_title: Agricultural Price Support Elimination Act of 1992

summary.text: Agricultural Price Support Elimination Act of 1992 - Amends certain agricultural Acts to repeal price support and other specified agricultural assistance programs for milk, cotton, rice, honey, and tobacco.

titles.title: Agricultural Price Support Elimination Act of 1992
A bill to eliminate the price support and production adjustment programs for milk, cotton, rice, honey, and tobacco, and for other purposes.
